resources.string: No barcode found! Please try again…
An unexpected read/write error occurred. Try to erase data in android/application settings if the problem persists.

Loyalty uses the advanced Loyalty API to automatically download the appropriate store logo for this loyalty card. Sometimes, however, multiple stores have the same name and cause Loyalty to choose the wrong one. If so, you can manually edit this by long-pressing the logo.
Enter a valid URL that refers to a logo (jpg, png or gif). Leave blank for default icon:
We\'re very sorry but we couldn\'t find the appropriate logo for this store. You can manually provide one by long-pressing the logo or you can stick to the default logo.
Could not connect to Loyalty API. Note that an internet connection is required to download the correct logo.
NOTE: Leave blank for default logo.
Please enter a valid store name

You can backup all of your previously saved loyalty cards here. This allows you to copy them all at once to a new device. Just press \"backup\" to create a backup file in the Loyalty directory on your SD-card and copy this file to a new device.

Restore previously saved data by pressing \"restore\" and selecting the desired file. Loyalty will then start to read the data and download the desired logos. A previously made backup file is typically found in the folder \"Loyalty\" and is called \"backup.ly\".
Could not create necessary directories! Please check your file permissions and try again.
An unexpected read/write error occurred. Please try again.
The file you selected is not a valid Loyalty file. Please select another one.
Loyalty detected that your device supports NFC and Android Beam. This means you can share cards by holding your device to the back of another NFC capable device. Try it out!
You decided to reject my write permissions. That\'s fine… But keep in mind that I cannot save newly made changes as long as this permission is not granted.

You decided to deny me access to the camera. I can function without these permissions, but you cannot scan barcodes. Please accept my request to access the camera if you want to automatically scan barcodes.
You rejected my read permissions. Please keep in mind that I cannot load previously saved data without these read permissions. If you want me to function properly, please grant me read permissions.
An internal exception occurred. Please try again…
An invalid card was trying to be updated…
